documentation.text:
@notice Gets the controller from an Id.
 @param _id id of a Data Request from which we get the controller.

estimateGasCost(uint256).details: Estimate the amount of reward we need to insert for a given gas price.

params._gasPrice: The gas price for which we need to calculate the reward.

returns._0: The reward to be included for the given gas price.

postDataRequest(address).details: Posts a data request into the WRB in expectation that it will be relayed and resolved in Witnet with a total reward that equals to msg.value.

params._requestAddress: The request contract address which includes the request bytecode.

returns._0: The unique identifier of the data request.

readDrTxHash(uint256).details: Retrieves the DR transaction hash of the id from the WRB.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

returns._0: The transaction hash of the DR.

readResult(uint256).details: Retrieves the result (if already available) of one data request from the WRB.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

upgradeDataRequest(uint256).details: Increments the reward of a data request by adding the transaction value to it.

params._id: The unique identifier of the data request.

params._newAddress: address of the new block relay to upgrade.

constructor.notice: Include an address to specify the Witnet Request Board.

upgradeWitnetRequestBoard(address).notice: Upgrades the Witnet Requests Board if the current one is upgradeable.

userdoc.notice: Contract to act as a proxy between the Witnet Bridge Interface and Contracts inheriting UsingWitnet.
